WorkItem.Description:
This is likely a silly question, but all KnightOS ROMs (http://www.ticalc.org/pub/84pluscse/os/) seem to only have a Home Screen but can't be used as a calculator.

Has anybody actually used these as an actual calculator?...ie. Get out of the Home Screen

Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Anyone had success with KnightOS ROMs

Comments.Message:
hi I actually found one but its only for the TI-83plus and its actually on the website you provided go to Archives>>File Archives>>83plus>>os>>baos.zip 
http://www.ticalc.org/pub/83plus/os/baos.zip   << or you can just click on this link to do it directly its from the website
